title: wine_Domaine_Serene_2007_Evenstad_Reserve_Pinot_Noir_(Willamette_Valley)
text:
Unnamed: 0: 41854.
country: US.
description: A very elegant and refined Evenstad Reserve, with grace notes of sandalwood and a lovely cherry core. The fruit is immaculate, the concentration focused and lengthy, and the flavors are so artfully blended that the wine is seamless and perfectly balanced. Although it is drinking like a mature wine, there is every reason to cellar wines such as this—it can develop like a fine Burgundy, over decades..
designation: Evenstad Reserve.
points: 95.
price: 58.0.
province: Oregon.
region_1: Willamette Valley.
region_2: Willamette Valley.
taster_name: Paul Gregutt.
taster_twitter_handle: @paulgwine .
